page.title: 09Recreation in Drayton
page.content: Drayton has a very active village life with many well_supported clubs and societies. {Sporting Clubs Badminton for adults and children is played in the Village Hall. Drayton Football Club plays on the adjacent Recreation Ground. Drayton Netball Club plays in Drayton Primary School and enters four teams in the Oxfordshire County League. {Daytime Groups} Mother and Toddler Group meets weekly in Drayton Hall. Pre_School Playgroup meets four days a week in Drayton Hall. Mothers Union meets monthly in the Church Room. Women's Fellowship meets weekly in the Baptist Church. {
